original_text: For he addeth rebellion unto his sin, he clappeth his hands among us, and multiplieth his words against God.
korean_text: 그가 그의 죄에 반역을 더하며 우리와 어울려 손뼉을 치며 하나님을 거역하는 말을 많이 하는구나

sentences.original_text: For he addeth rebellion unto his sin
he clappeth his hands among us
and multiplieth his words against God
